desc: Ron Dalla C1934 is a place all age men can come to find their formal wear from their suits, dress shirt, ties and shoes. but can also find something casual anything from shorts for the warmer weather to tracksuits to the cooler weather. don't forget about our most favourite brand RM Williams, Industrie, Connor and More

layout.text: FROM BOYS TO MENSWEAR, FOR FORMAL EVENTS TO CASUAL GATHERINGS. RON DALLA IS HERE FOR ALL OCCASIONS
Serving the Griffith region and beyond for over 87 years
